reviews.review: 把那个女孩给我，我们的债务就一笔勾销，可是到了最后真的勾销了吗，心中的债务也许一直都不能忘记了

记得刚进哥伦比亚是教堂响起的歌吗？

记得你弹琴时伊丽莎白唱的歌吗？
                                                                      ——《Will The Circle Be Unbroken》

[spoiler]伊丽莎白啊唉，只要你过得好就行了啊[/spoiler]

The Franchise lost it's soul after the first Bioshock. 

Bioshock 2 und Infinite are either a rehash or something completely different. 

Where are the hazardous environments, a well done story or the rp elements? 

Instead we get an arguably decent shooter, with a Deus Ex Machina Mary Sue character. While the story tries to shoe horn "lore" into Rapture to legimitise is existence.

재미있는지 모르겄다.

바이오쇼크 시리즈는

스킬쓰는맛이있긴한대

그것도 모르겠고

1,2가 워낙 띵작이고

이런게임은 tps로 해야 어울리는거같다 확실히...

tps모드를 줘
I have no idea what the fuck happened

Obre maestra imperdible. Gráficas hermosas, juego súper pulido, historia maravillosa llena de giros, variedad de armas y poderes, mecánica que te obliga a usar varias armas durante el juego. Mi única queja es que en modo difícil me pareció algo fácil.
good

入坑steam以来第一篇测评给Elizabeth
我终究没有带伊丽莎白去巴黎
通关了之后我丝毫不想再经历后面的的黑暗而只想看着她在港口的舞蹈，看她戴上我给她选的choker时脸上的笑
哥伦比亚很美，如同一个即将融化的冰淇淋，外表光鲜亮丽，各处都在土崩瓦解
画面非常舒服，很适合喜欢复古风格的玩家，Elizabeth的人物刻画让你不知不觉地就离不开她
Elizabeth被抓走的那一刻脑子一轰
你以为自己在帮助Elizabeth拯救Elizabeth，其实一直是她在拯救你
玩到怀疑人生
“Are you afraid of god?"
"No, I'm afraid of you."

¿En serio estas leyendo los comentarios para convencerte de invertir en uno de los mejores juegos de la ultima decada?
 (¿Y MAS AUN EN OFERTA DE STEAM????)
Permiteme amigo, disipar tus dudas simplemente con estas 2 frases del juego: :No Spoilers:
"La mente del sujeto luchara desesperadamente por crear recuerdos donde no los hay"
-
"¿Por que me preguntas como? La pregunta jugosa es ¿Cuando? 
Vive, vivió, vivirá .... Muere, murió, morirá"
-
Es Bioshock, se compra por la experiencia de la trama y poco mas, no hay multijugador pero ahora tiene mas acción, disparos, enemigos y vaya que hasta una waifu que es útil y carismática.
Solo ... compra el juego ...
Amazing game, amazing story! In many ways, even better than Bioshock 1. Especially the story is amazing, one of the best ever in a video game.
No lo jugue mucho pero hasta el momento me encanto sus personajes su historia es muy entretenido
Best Game Ever Made.
great game, bioshock series is the best. i pre-ordered this game for console and have played it about 10 times since
Top
Amazing graphics with an amazing story. Gameplay was a little meh tho, but still enjoyable.
通关后最令我遗憾的就是没能带伊丽莎白去巴黎吧

Aun teniendo el juego en PS3, me atrevi a comprarlo otra vez y sin dudarlo. Porque cuando llegue el momento, podre gozar nuevamente de esta... como decirlo adecuadamente? Obra Maestra.
Y no, no me tomare el tiempo de describir tal belleza como lo es Bioshock Infinite, porque cuando te hablan de un cuadro de arte, no puedes asimilar y admirarla completa y realmente hasta que tu mismo la ves, en este caso, no puedes contemplar realmente este juegazo hasta que lo jueges por ti mismo.
Piece of wonderful art, that'll be cherished forever. Not as good as the original. One of the best games i played in my life, my entire existence.

Can I play it again for the first time? 

Great story and world building, I really didn't want it to end.

离我通关已经过去了很久，终于有决心来写一篇评论。
无限这一部作品的整体感觉和一代二代的画风都有所改变，更偏向油画一样的渲染，还有终于能够看见天了！
基本没有什么难度的战斗，上去怼就行了。
重点还是在剧情，剧透？不存在的，剧透就没有意思了，
你只有一个目标就是要要帮助伊丽莎白，但是实际上都是伊丽莎白在帮你，残血的时候一瓶血扔你脸上，没子弹啪又扔过来。真“无限”,音乐满分！氛围满分！伊丽莎白满分！游戏的氛围是逐渐推进的，到了游戏后期，你会见到一个完全不一样的世界，最后到头来你会发现，问题永远会出在你自己身上。
짠거 많이 먹으면 몸에 안좋아

Instantly in love with this game. You know, I adore steampunk, mysteries and an unknown powers, but whenyou merge them together and put it into the Orwells philosophy it's priceless. Also have to mention that story is well done, characters as well. :)
It won't be your favourite BioShock that's for sure but it's way better than 2
Love it the one of my favorit game on the earth
Masterpiece. Great storyline, and action is quite balanced and satiftying. I'm in love with every little detail in this game.
Surprised me in the best way possible. Enjoyed mixing up vigor combinations and the gunplay was commendable. Although the inexistence of multiple endings left a sour taste in my mouth.
你永远都不知道我在游戏过程中有多少次想让伊丽莎白回头，一切的一切由我来完成，但是已经无法改变
nice story and graphic

11/10 masterpiece.














Nos quieren hacer soldados de hojalata

Es un juego q al inicio lo dude al comprarlo porq mi pc no tiene muy buenos componentes pero al momento de jugarlo me va bn es un juego q vale mucho la pena la dificultad se nota "cuando apenas inicio y lo pongo en dificil :V" exelentes graficos buena jugabilidad y muchos lugares q conoces y explorar. bno en definitiva cojelo en alguna rebaja esta MUY BUENO
스팀러로써 이 게임이 없다면 조금 아니 많이 문제가 있다. 그동안 좋은 스토리를 가진 게임이 없어서 짜증났는데 다끝나고 엔딩보는데 누가 뒤통수 한대 존나 세게 후려갈긴 기분이다. 더 말안하겠다. 사라

Hafızamı silip tekrar oynamak istiyorum

15 hr game suitable under maximum difficulty expansions visuals are exceptional as per old game settings recreated to fit the narrative. I love the series and hope for additional games I highly recommend the series but do not recommend the remastered versions due to unstable content under higher graphics settings.

BioShock serisi başlı başlına bir şahaserdi,BioShock Infinite ise bu şahaseri daha yükseğe taşıdı.Atrık incelememize gecelim.
Aslın böyle bir oyuna inceleme yapmak sadece hikayesine grafiklerine oynanışına puan vermek ile yapılmalı çünkü böyle bir hikayede spoiler yemek içinizi açıtabilir ama ucundan bir şeyler yaziyim.Hikaye DeWitt abimizin (Booker) yaptığı bir anlaşma nedeni ile bir kızı kaçırmaya atılmasında başlar.Bu yolda kendine peygamber bir herif,halkını ezerek üste çıkan bir silah satıcısı 
ve kendinden üstünleri öldürüp alt kısma yardım eden sayko bir direniş grubu ve son olarak görüp görebileceğiniz en çirkin kuş ile karşılaşır.Bütün engelleri geçip sona ulaştığınızda ise bir oyun ne kadar beyin yakabilir onun cevabını alıyorsunuz . Bu arada Elizabeth (Anna) Oyun dünyasının gelmiş geçmiş en iyi kadın karakteridir

说实话我的脑子玩完之后 并没有完全理解这裂缝和无限个世界入口的各种以及[spoiler]这什么comstock和我又是一个人啦[/spoiler]什么乱七八糟的。。。
综合体验还不错 各种zz隐喻以及小说里的各种标志性主题应有尽有什么云中城啦 穿越啦 亲情啦 轮回设定啦 蒸汽朋克啦 不过社保到最后感觉自己对这个战斗系统的熟练程度其实还非常一般 以及我印象里好像没有BOSS战 个人感觉仅这点体验略差于古墓9这种，战斗没有什么阶段性的感觉，也就飞艇一战比较有印象 其他的基本就是我先开一枪，然后等敌人们都来送给我打就好了 反正他们都知道我在哪
画面美术风格确实非常棒，在前中期美瞎我之后在后期也成功的闪瞎了我。。
剧情和我想得不太对，（开门搞死老大爷），接下来不应该是伊丽莎白和主角在一起幸福的生活。怎么主角开门之后就洗礼了。 玩完后内心还有点小纠结 ，不过看到那么多女儿，感觉也值了。 顺带一提 我永远喜欢伊丽莎白 （即使她搞死我）

[i] 如果早知道永远也不能带她去巴黎，我就不应该在那天下午打断那个在沙滩上翩翩起舞的女孩[/i]
其他妙处无须尽述，这是一部完全对得起“第九艺术”这个概念的游戏，在绚丽到极致的蒸汽朋克风格后乌托邦都市设定里配上侦探剧，枪斗和时空系作品中最高质量的剧本之一，美术，音乐，剧本都是上乘中的上乘，你很难找到不去吹这游戏的理由
DLC2最后布克带伊丽莎白逃命时候的一句话让本作在我玩过的loop系游戏里直接一步封神，这段台词我记了四五年，时空系游戏里面我没见过比这句的节奏感和冲击力更强的，听完只感觉脑子里嗡嗡的

[b] What if we run into ourselves at the past?[/b]
我们要是撞到过去的自己该怎么办？
[b]We WON'T[/b]
那不可能发生！
[b]Why?[/b]
为什么？
[b]Because we DIDN'T[/b]
因为那种事从未发生过！

10/10，永远的伊丽莎白

Очень душевная и атмосферная игра. Из всех 3-х чатсей понравилась больше всего именно эта. Из персонажей в этой части однозначно понравилась Элизабет. Заморочка с сюжетом и связью с предыдущими частями BioShock - это божественно 11/10
Relly good story, good graphics and good gameplay. Must buy and try!

本來是想給好評的.但我是買123合集的.所以從整體看只能給差評.
因為遊戲破關後資料無法繼承.讓人不想再玩第二輪.劇情好不好我是無所謂.
最高難度太難根本自虐.很多時候都像瞎子在蒐集銀幣跟物品而已.哪漏掉也不知.
搜集留聲機成就也沒解到.還有1跟2的重製版或原版都有當機或開不進遊戲的BUG.
跟生化危機4差很多.雖然畫面人物不盡理想.但就是重玩好幾輪了.玩最難的也沒在怕.
因為是我在虐遊戲.不是遊戲虐我.百玩不膩才是單機王道.之後考慮把這合集從我遊戲收藏庫clear.

Inarguably one of the finest games ever made. 

As a quick note this is actually System Shock 5.  There's no need to play the first 4 but you f'ing should plus System Shock 3 is important to understanding some of the plot of the Burial at Sea add-ons. 

The series picks up again in bethesda's System Shock 6: Prey.  You should f'ing play that too.

เนื้อเรื่องดี
great game nice story
11/10 would play 100 times again.

熬夜打通了本体和两个dlc，本人整天沉迷吸守望，很久没有认真去玩一个游戏了，感慨万千又难以言表，个人不胜言辞，随便说说感受：首先画质上来说不算差，哥伦比亚真的是很美很神圣，很喜欢20世纪的复古感，但销魂城真的很压抑；射击手感上也还可以，毕竟老游戏了也不能要求太多；正片来说的话剧情很丰富饱满，有着不俗的故事情节，也有些隐晦的部分，但到结尾就基本会恍然大悟，差不多理解了来龙去脉，建议去网上看看评测或者解析以便更好理解；海葬dlc的话建议去玩玩前两部生化奇兵，反正我个人因为渣机的缘故带不动重置版，dlc里面的人物关系和大的故事背景不太了解，但单对dlc的故事而言不算难懂，算是对正片的一个补充和与前两部的联系。总而言之，个人认为生化奇兵无限真的可以算得上满分神作，促销的时候入绝对物超所值。
最后！为伊丽莎白小姐姐打电话！！！啊啊啊啊啊好喜欢伊丽莎白小姐姐！！！去哪找这么个不给你挡路不添乱，还在关键时候给你扔子弹扔蓝瓶，最重要还这么漂亮的小姐姐啊！！！
영화를 보았습니다.
打完本体很难受,打完DLC更难受了。绝对的经典大作

Дико расхайпленная в своё время часть серии. По большей части из-за того, что в видеоигру в первый раз за долгое время подвезли интересный и относительно нетипичный сюжет. Присутствует своя непередаваемая атмосфера. Ну и Элизабет.

布克，你害怕上帝吗？不，我害怕的是你。
天使原本生活在白云之上，神说，去世间吧。于是天使长出了翅膀降落凡间。看到所谓的安定不过是暗流涌动，所谓的革命不过是暴政的开端，所谓的救赎不过是谎言的欺骗。
她选择了死亡，选择以生命之光为这暗淡的世间点亮一盏灯火，照亮小女孩前行的道路

“把女孩带给我们，你的债一笔勾销”
即是走上救赎，也是走上完结

게임성 -삼부작 중 최고. 액션은 화끈했고 내 샷건은 뜨거웠다. 전투에서의 자유도를 최고로 끌어올려준 덕분에 막 날라댕기면서 총을 뽱뽱 쏴 대는 쾌감을 느끼게 해 준다.

스토리 - [spoiler]다중 세계라는 소재는[/spoiler] 흥미로웠지만 1편의 계급 갈등이라는 주제에서 조금 확장된 세계관이라는 느낌을 지울 수 없다, 물론 자유주의 이상의 한계와 빈부 격차 문제의 사회 문제를 폭로하는 것이 바이오쇼크 시리즈의 핵심 주제라 어쩔 수 없는 것도 있다, 또한 개발진들은 이 게임을 통해서 특히 현재 미국이 겪는 여러 문제들을 비판하고자 하는 것 같다. 맹목적인 애국주의라든가 인종차별이라든가. 

예술성 - 지상에 이런 곳이 있다면 지금 내 여자친구를 데리고 평생 이곳에서 살거다. 너무 아름답다. 물론 천국의 가면을 쓴 지옥이지만 말이다.

총평 : (디스토피아적인 분위기를 좋아하는 내 취향상) 주제의 진중함과 분위기는 1편보다 못한 건 아니지만 2% 부족한 느낌이다. 다만 언제까지나 우중충한 바다에 쳐 박혀서 게임의 이야기를 이끌어나갈 수도 없는 노릇이기에 훌륭한 분위기 쇄신이었다고 생각한다. 10점 만점에 9.5점.

“The Lord forgives everything. But I'm just a prophet… so I don't have to. Amen.”
― Father Comstock
One of the greatest games you will ever play.

Cóż, moim zdaniem to jest jedna z najlepszych gier w jakie kiedykolwiek grałem... Kreacja postaci Elizabeth jest po prostu przegenialna. Byłem totalnie kupiony jej historią. W drugiej połowie tej gry zaczęło się robić trochę dziwaczniej, ponieważ doszły duchy... Liczyłem na świetne zakończenie i zwieńczenie tego wszystkiego, ale muszę powiedzieć, że troszeczkę się zawiodłem, ponieważ dla mnie to nie było to. Jasne, daje do myślenia, ale po prostu jakoś mi się nie spodobało... Ogólnie strzela się bardzo dobrze. Spluwy mają kopa... Dochodzą też wigory, czyli takie jakby zaklęcia. To jest po prostu niesamowicie zrobione. Projekt Kolumbii jest przepiękny, choć trochę boli mnie to, że to wszystko poszło z dymem. Podsumowując - BioShock Infinite to nie tylko gra, to niesamowiete przeżycie. Polecam dla każdego! - 9,5/10.
One of the best shotters that I played and enjoyed playing.

Bioshock.... O Que dizer desta maravilhosa trilogia? Simplesmente uma das melhores que eu já joguei, mas um deles, conquistou um lugar especial no fundo do meu coração Bioshock Infinite. Um jogo simplesmente incrivel, com uma história mais incrivel ainda, o qual lhe arranca suspiros e lagrimas a cada minuto e a cada nova descoberta.

 Mas vamos lá. Falando sobre a jogabilidade:
É boa, não das melhores, mas funcional e agradável ao jogador. Com Booker você pode: andar, correr, pular, mirar (M3), atirar (não há bullet drop), saltar em ganchos e aero-trilhos, executar inimigos quando em stealth ou saltando de ganchos em cima deles; e usar vigores (vulgo plasmideos para quem jogou os outros games da franquia).

 Não há grandes dificuldades no jogo, se já jogou os outros games e tem noção de como usar os plasmideos, pode ir direto para o hard, caso contrário, jogue no médio mesmo.

 História.....  O jogo se passa basicamente em columbia, onde booker foi contratado para resgatar uma jovem chamada Elizabeth, a qual após ser resgatada, ira virar sua companheira. Porem não se preocupe, ela não ira o atrapalhar. Você também não precisa cuidar dela durante os combates, ela é independente e ira lhe ajudar em alguns momentos, coletando munição, dinheiro e sais. 
 Como você já deve ter percebido, a história é simplesmente sensacional, sem mais. Porem muito difícil de compreender, tanto é que na primeira vez que zerei, tudo que achei que tinha entendido, era ao contrário. Você deve escutar o maximo de voxophones (gravações de áudio) possível e tentar buscar todos os cinetoscópios (lugares onde você assiste a pequenos filmes que contam ou explicam um trecho da história). 
Caso não entenda ela, ou não esta afim de zerar de novo, procure um vídeo explicativo no YT. 
Também recomendo jogar os outros dois games da franquia, ou ao menos o 2°.

 Ambientação. Rica em detalhes,  ela "segue" a tematica dos outros bioshock's. Retro, com um toque futurista. Pore nessa com lindas contruções aereas e monumentos que o fazem parar por um momento apenas para admirá-los.

 E como tudo que é bom dura pouco, o jogo tem campanha princípal de apenas 14H, parando para prestar atenção nos detalhes. Que por sinal, são muitos e muito bem feitos.
Bioshock também conta com 3 dlc's. Burial at sea pt 1 e 2, e, Clash in the Clouds.
有E那么好的AI买这游戏真值。
Запутался в середине игры. Какаие-то другие миры, непонятные перемещения... хорошо, что хоть в концовке все понятно объяснили.
生化奇兵无限，不能真的说是神作但是不说是神作也可惜了。。。。这游戏做成剧情向游戏就好了。。。偏要加那么多无所谓战斗。。。搞得剧情很不连贯
Bioshock é uma série sensacional apenas jogue.

[h1] Bioshock: Infinite [/h1]

[b] Release: [/b] March 26, 2013 
[b] Genre: [/b] First-person shooter 
[b] Mode: [/b] Single-player 

[b] Gameplay: [/b] < 15 hours 
[b] Achievements: [/b] Easy | [strike] Medium [/strike] | [strike] Hard [/strike] 
[b] Rating: [/b] 9/10 

[b] "A mindblowing story." [/b]

The story makes you think twice about the events that are going to happen and the events that have happened. This is the kind of game when you finished it, you need some time off the computer and just proces  what just happened. 

The game is about a man called "Booker DeWitt" who is emotionally scarred from the acts of violence he committed at the Battle of Wounded Knee. He started gambling and was loaded mountains of debts. The only way to erase the debts was to fulfill a task, he has to travel to Columbia to rescue a girl named Elizabeth. Throughout the entire game you will come across many blank spots in the story which makes you ponder about the things you see, read and hear. But don't get too confused, the more you proceed trough the game, the more it makes sense.

Besides the good story, the game is quit easy to get into. The game gives you a couple of weapons, powers and gear to complete each stage of the game and therefore gives you time to fool around, look for secrets and most importantly to enjoy the story and environment. If you're up for a challenge you can unlock a "hardmode" after completing the game or by using the following cheatcode at the start menu: [spoiler] UP, UP, DOWN, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, ["CANCEL"], ["CONFIRM"] [/spoiler]

This game is a musthave. Even if you're not into shooters this game will probably still win you over storywise. That said, you should atleast consider buying this game if not watching the gameplay online.

暂时给个好评吧, 第一人称视角晕的不行, 真快吐了

BioShock Infinite ist meines Erachtens der beste Teil der BioShock-Reihe, wobei sich die Meinungen natürlich unterscheiden können. Doch die Atmosphäre und die Leichtigkeit der Steuerung, die Action und die Story sind atemberaubend. Nur wenige Spiele haben mich so lange vor dem Rechner gefesselt, dass ich vollkommen den Tag verzockt hatte.
Es macht Spaß die Gegner zu erledigen, aber auch das Geheimnis zu offenbaren, weshalb man diese Mission machen muss und auch die kleinen Extras im Spiel zu finden macht es einfach spaßig und zeitraubend.
Fun game but its a set path so there isnt overly alot of exploring in this game, I would still suggest this game for the story but the ending will confuse 90% who play it

第四款打通的射击游戏，前三款是传送门（？）、质量效应和辐射

但虽说是射击，只要不选困难，是没什么难度的，完全可以靠异能（ME：mmp）过去；不过战斗真心炫酷好玩

剧情很震撼且很有深度，最后又有很合理的解释。

Excellent game. Can't decide which Bioshock is my favorite, but this stacks up with the other two.
Lot of fun achievements to hunt down as well.

Exelente jogo, Melhor franquia de games que já terminei!

Не думаю что нужно описывать сюжет, стилистику, геймплей, потому что это не  игра,
это сказка! А их лучше щупать в живую.
Хотя все-таки геймплей мог бы быть.. не лучше, он и так хорош, но не хватало разнообразия этого процесса.
Абсолютно каждая битва напоминает предыдущую, да и само разделение на арены как в новеньком Думе совсем не радует, хотелось бы иметь цельности всего шествия Букера по Колумбии,  но это просто меркнет пред остальным что дает вам игра, эмоций будет предостаточно, так что можно это и потерпеть.

Mind blowing. 
I don't think I can ever play another game again

在多年前我在快玩上无意玩到了这款游戏，当时我第一眼就被它那绚丽、魔幻的场景所惊呆了。而事实上，它还远不于此。这款游戏不论是从场景画面、音效、剧情、人设、战斗等等各个方面都绝对是超3A水准。它完美地诠释了为什么游戏可以被称为第九艺术。尤其是女主的设定真的是行业标杆，至今无人能出其右。你能真正感觉到你是在和伊丽莎白并肩战斗，可以感觉到她的情感，你会忘了她是游戏中的NPC而好像是个真正的、会同你共呼吸的人。这是一个让我即使过去几年也会记忆犹新的游戏，令人难忘。所以打折的时候我毫不犹豫地补了个票，不过好像因为销量不好制作组已经解散了，但还是希望有机会玩到续作。

伊丽莎白可以说是继半条命二后给我印象最深刻的AI了，玩之前并没什么感觉，但真正玩了这款游戏后我才发现她的魅力，见到伊丽莎白时我的感觉就和半条命第一次见到艾丽克斯一样—— 真TM好看                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                       生气了吗
                                                                                                                                                                                       没有哦
Amazing game.10/10
